statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(1) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_analysis WHERE behavior_category = 'active' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND user_id = 20 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('click', 'hover') AND user_id = 30 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, behavior_category FROM engagement_analysis WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY user_id, engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY user_id, interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT engagement_id, timestamp FROM user_engagement ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, analysis_result FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details->>'action' AS action FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT engagement_id, user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 0.8 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS_TEXT(analysis_result->'recommendations') AS recommendation FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 456 AND behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions UNION ALL SELECT * FROM user_engagement UNION ALL SELECT * FROM user_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.email FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type FROM platform_activities WHERE activity_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT metric_type, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY metric_type ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND metric_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM platform_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_type, feedback_message FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT page_name, user_id FROM page_view WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM user_interaction_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT page_id, page_name, user_id, timestamp FROM page_view WHERE page_name LIKE '%homepage%';
SELECT user_id, feedback_type, feedback_message FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
